Pages.Name: func_areaportal
Pages.Description: A portal brush used to manage visibility in maps. Portals define areas, which are spaces that are connected in the map. Both sides of a portal cannot touch the same area, for example, a doughnut shaped map would require at least two portals to divide the map into two areas. A linear map could be divided into two areas with a single area portal.

Properties.Description: Name(s) of script files that are executed after all entities have spawned.
The name that other entities refer to this entity by.
(Optional) The name of a door whose open/closed state controls the on/off state of this area portal.
(Don't change). Differentiates between shipping HL2 maps and maps using new engine features.
